website_summaries.verdict: Has a much bigger, easy-to-read screen, and it performs cleanly with none of the so-so features like voice command cluttering its hardware.
pros: We like the ability to add some 3rd-party OV2 files for specialized maps
Large 6-inch touchscreen and nice form factor
cons: Like all TomToms, memory capacity can be an issue
Accuracy can be off by a few hundred feet

customer_reviews.title: Be aware ...
customer_reviews.text: They advertise free lifetime maps but fail to mention that the manufacturer charges an additional $130.00 for the computer driver to update the maps. I was replacing my current TomTom GPS which also provided free lifetime map updates and is functioning with out issue because the manufacturer stopped updating the maps for that model - hence the need for a new GPS. Will be returning this item - it's not worth the overall cost to own this device.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Freezes up-Useless
customer_reviews.text: Brand New! The screen has frozen solid as soon as connected it to "my drive connect" to update it. It has been frozen. Unable to use it. I tried all the fixes that TOMTOM had suggested. Nothing has worked. Tomtom support is not there. When you turn it on it freezes after the drum roll sound and the map is on screen. It worked until I connected it to the TomTom App. Now I am out $120. and it's useless. Product is TomTom VIA1625TM 6 Inch GPS Navigation Device.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jane Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: download takes at least 2.5 hours, upgrade fails, the Traffic does not work.
customer_reviews.text: download takes at least 2.5 hours, upgrade fails and then the cycle of "download to upgrade" started over and over and each cycle takes between 2.5 hours to 3 hours, the Traffic feature does not work. It's good price but I wish it works, but it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Viet Son

customer_reviews.title: Use Google instead
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use on a long trip pulling our trailer, because it said you could program for trailer restrictions. The glare at any time of the day makes it impossible to see. NOTHING was user friendly!! Difficult to program. Could not connect to Bluetooth to get traffic alerts. Took us off the highway twice into areas that were not really trailer friendly. We have used Tomtom’s before and were very happy with them. We will finish our trip using Google Maps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kelly

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money unless you like getting lost!
customer_reviews.text: absolutely terrible...spent almost $200 and it gives the wrong directions and has gotten me lost more times than it actually led me to my location. if i could give less stars i would. i wish i had the box to return it. never again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT have Traffic Management! Operates poorly - long delays changing screens to enter an address. Piece of crap. Most Tom Toms come with an unlock code - wasn't furnished. Map has a lot of significant address errors in the Omaha area.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad unit if you only want to use it at ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen is not bright enough to use on a sunny day. I has taken me to the wrong location more than once. Not a bad unit if you only want to use it at night to get to places you don't want to go.
customer_reviews.author: MechEngineer

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: Advertising with free lifetime updates, so why did I get a email just months after purchase telling me to download the final update And I could get future updates for A $105.00 contract? The device works well, but it is advertised with free life time Traffic and map updates. After having the device about two months I receive a email telling me this map update is the last available under your current subscription, but I can renew my subscription for an additional $109. Was not aware of this whenever I purchased the device. Seems like bait and switch to me.
customer_reviews.author: Percy

customer_reviews.title: Manhandled by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Unit was thrown into an Amazon shipping box with no padding or protection of any kind. When it got here, the unit powered up, but that was as far as it goes. Updates failed. Interface failed. Neither Tomtom nor Amazon support could help make it work and it was sent back for a replacement. If the replacement fails, I'll navigate with with paper maps. I should probably note that the quality of a fifteen year old unit that Tomtom decided not to support anymore seemed to be exceptionally better than the brand new piece of junk I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Formhals

customer_reviews.title: Use Google Maps on Your Phone
customer_reviews.text: We had a GPS about 10 years ago. This one has worse technology than that one. The interface is clunky. It doesnt recognize half of what you type so you have to constantly retype. It is really slow. The system settings keep changing. For instance, it turns the voice off all the time. It also keeps resetting to "avoid highways", etc. I nver touch the settings until I realize it is acting goofy. The maps seem accurate. I bought this to save battery on my phone but google maps is far, far better.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Updating maps impossible
customer_reviews.text: 1. It constantly 'loses connection', even though connected to a new computer with cord supplied and using the mydrive software. Needed to unplug and plug back in 20 times, then gave up. It may be a defective unit, don't know, but when I called customer support - there was none on the weekend. 2. mydrive text is like 8 point font - really hard to read and no way to make larger.
customer_reviews.author: peppermint patty

customer_reviews.title: How to add tons of time rerouting your route
customer_reviews.text: The worst GPS EVER! I set the GPS to avoid HOV lanes, because my route requires Easypass to use them. The GPS decided to reroute me repeatedly to try and put me on the HOV lanes. I lost an extra hour. Then when it was time to exit the highway, it decided I should head back the other way instead of where I was going. Slowest start up of any GPS I have ever used. You cannot enter a destination until it locates your current location. Since satellite feed is poor in my neighborhood, you cannot program the unit until you have gone 5 miles. But then you are driving and should not program it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Samans-Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Tomtom not worth the aggravation.  Totally fraudulent.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my tomtom gps, I assumed it would functional. When I called tomtom I was told that I would have to pay an additional 129.00$ for the gps to work (drivers missing from unit). I consider this to be fraud and thievery, as you can't sell something that isn't functional. They had the gall to say that I only paid for the unit, not functionality. That functionality must be paid for. There was no mention made on any of the instructions or box of this. I would never ever recommend this company to any one. Included in price was unlimited map and traffic updates.
customer_reviews.author: Lester S.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about a week and would not charge. Finally ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a week and would not charge. Finally found a number for customer service. Big run around, basically my tough luck. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Riley

customer_reviews.title: TomTom kinda guy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using TomTom GPSr's for a VERY long time. My one that was well over 10 years old finally started stuttering and so I really needed to get another. Quick set up and easy to set a home location. This is a good low dollar GPSr for your auto. Not fancy, user interface is a little different than my older model, but not hard to learn in about 5 minutes or so. I had no issues as I will be doing a major road trip with it in the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: ShearerFamily

customer_reviews.title: Address input hard to do.
customer_reviews.text: This GPS is super slow, somehow accurate and really uneasy to input any address specially if its to be used in the US. I'm a city driver and use it all the time, but I need to start input the address like, street number, street name, and lately a city. I wish there is a way to invert that. It's a totally inconvenient product to me. I won't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Max Fm LA

customer_reviews.title: battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies within 10 minutes. Plugged in the screen is so dim you can't see it. Support told me same stupid tips 3 times. YES BATTERY WAS COMPLETELY CHARGED. YES I USED CORD THAT CAME WITH. YES I'M DRIVING A NEW VEHICLE. Installed brand new battery and same thing!!! Something is draining the battery!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my buy,very
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough of tomtom. Missed a exit due to traffic in NY construction zone, back on track within two minuets. Can’t say I’ve traveled the USA with it, but it has served me well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert plante

customer_reviews.title: SLOOOOOW touchscreen !!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge TOMNTOM fan !!! I am a bit disappointed in this unit. The response of the touch screen will drive you crazy !!!! The voice directions on some of the voices can BARELY be heard !!! The unit does update quickly and seems to be quite accurate !!!
customer_reviews.author: No1KyFan

customer_reviews.title: Faster and easier to use than older models. Readable driving screen.
customer_reviews.text: 5" screen just a little small for me. TomTom doesn't give you all features described for free. I miss the name of my destination on the screen. They had this feature on the old 4" model. Touch screen and icons easy to use. Easier and faster to enter travel points than earlier models. Side bar for construction, gas stations, ... So they don't fill up your driving screen.
customer_reviews.author: Chris, Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are much easier to use GPSs available for just a few dollars more.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She hated the interface for entering destinations. Returned it after she used it for a week and dropped it into my lap with an angry face. This model is old tech. She got lost the first three times she used it because it told her to take turns that weren’t there, and even sent her 16 miles out of her way, for a destination 4 miles away. And yes, we did all the updates before-hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Downey

customer_reviews.title: I will say it’s GREAT! Having the larger screen makes it easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Though I was a little hesitant about the 6” screen to being too large,I will say it’s GREAT! Having the larger screen makes it easy to quickly look at the gps directions. The TomTom software is very easy to use but also robust! I really like the side panel on the screen that shows upcoming traffic delays and gas station/rest areas. Very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found anything that would change my positive opinion of TomTom. Everything works as expected. Some destinations aren't accurate, but that was a minor problem with all my other TomTom products. Overall, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Osmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend. I have one and my job has me on the road all day and because it talks to my Iphone it has saved me a lot of time. It reroutes me around accidents and I depend on it daily. There have been a few occasions that it has taken me to the address and there was nothing there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but slow to update.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that keeps me from being totally positive about this GPS is the fact it took an hour and a half to update the map right out of the box. The last TOMTOM I had was the same as it would always take over an hour to update. TOMTOM if you want me to pay extra for the safety camera updates, make the update process take a reasonable amount of time. In this day of highspeed communication it should not take more than 10 min, max.
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: What happened to TomTom?
customer_reviews.text: I've had TomTom GPSs for over 20 years. This would have been my 4th one. I loved TomToms and would always recommend them. What happened? On this newer model the user interface completely changed. Very clunky. If that was the only issue, I could get used to it, but the response time and touch sensitivity was also terrible. I reluctantly returned the TomTom and purchased the Garmin 55. Much better responsiveness, interface, graphics and so far very accurate. Good bye TomTom. RIP
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this versipn
customer_reviews.text: I like ease of set up. This replaced an older version which had much better graphics, touch screen speed, memory of last destinations, and an on and off button. I bought the newer version Setember 2018 because I wanted a higher performance version which failed the test as well as of yesterday, a complete shutdown; it will not power up at all. Don't buy this vetsion..$150 waste of money..will continue using old version
customer_reviews.author: Stan Vossler

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It took a good 10 minutes to configure satellite each time. It died after only 6 uses over the course of 6 months ...Sooo, what.. it cost me over 21 dollars per use. Thanks so much. It was really nice getting lost in the middle of a vacation trip.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Majhenich

customer_reviews.title: Very dim screen image
customer_reviews.text: This is the third TomTom unit I’ve owned and was looking forward to an updated version. I am very disappointed however, particularly by the dim screen image that I can hardly see during the day. The brightness was as high as allowed and the dim images and glare on the screen made seeing the information very difficult. I never had this problem with my previous units.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: It's New and  Exceeds My Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: The TomTom VIA 1625 TM is just what I wanted to replace my old (5 year old TomTom) that went dead on me. This unit is faster and possesses more features that I use. I also got it for the larger screen which is a plus for me. Only a few adjustments were made to use my old mounting in my car. Good unit good value. Software expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: dvane

customer_reviews.title: Large screen.
customer_reviews.text: Love Tomtom. Had a Garmin. Just didn't update route fast enough. Driving in LA, one needs more than 'next exit' to get over 5 lanes of traffic. TomTom gives me ample notice. Life time free updates. Very satisfied with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: slow performer, awful software
customer_reviews.text: This tomtom worked worse than the one I have had for ten years. It would not let me add new routes. It kept going back to the original route that I did not want to take. My smart phone is worlds better than this. I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: John  R Fahnestock

customer_reviews.title: User interface is a lot more difficult than my old Tom Tom
customer_reviews.text: The new interface is difficult to navigate. I wish my old Tom Tom was still working. The touch screen needs to pressed very hard sometimes. I will keep struggling with it. I don't have a choice.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Young

customer_reviews.title: it seems to love to take you on the backroads a hell of a lot
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why the option of use the damn highways as much as possible isn't an option. It tries to take me down horse only roads, really rough roads. No real options for highway.
customer_reviews.author: nada

customer_reviews.title: Screen Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I have had other Tom Toms and they were great. This one is also good but the the screen is too small for me to see when driving. I was away and missed the return date so am stuck with one that I can't use. My fault so lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: Gunther

customer_reviews.title: A great Tom tom
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a very good Tom Tom. It was not easy putting in a specific route, but was advised by friend to travel on specific roads even though they were not the shortest. So far it works well and it’s nice to hear clear instructions on exits and exchanges.
customer_reviews.author: Ron123

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this product on a weekend trip out of town. It was useless. Although the screen had bright clear colors indoors as I became acquainted with it, I could barely see the screen in my car. I relied some on the voice commands, but eventually turned it off. Even while driving on familiar roads, the directions were confusing. Truly a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: DRG

customer_reviews.title: Great unit if you want to keep it simple.
customer_reviews.text: Like all GPS units I've had, it sometimes takes you on Alice in Wonderland adventures, but 99.99% of the time it's great. So if you see the sign to the highway to your left, and it sends you to the right, just know it's going to take you to the highway, but you'll travel through five suburban neighborhoods first... and it may be another entrance five miles away.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Load when you are not in a hurry.
customer_reviews.text: It must have exact names to find a place. Makes it hard if you aren't sure of spelling. There are many steps to getting sites into your favorites list. However it has been extremely accurate. I had a Garmin. Much simpler, but older model that has tried to kill me more than once by trying to turn me off a bridge or into a lake.
customer_reviews.author: Prrrup

customer_reviews.title: Good GPS
customer_reviews.text: Better & faster than older model GPS I’ve been using. Interface is significantly different than older Tom Tom I replaced. Retail on these is $159.00; I’m glad I didn’t spend that amount, but on sale or reduced price it’s a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: All went well until I was told to do a legal U turn on a major highway then take the left lane. Following those instructions it put me back onto the highway going the wrong way. The instructions should have been, after doing the U turn to take the center of three lanes. The right lane was a right turn lane and the center lane took me to my destination. I tried to program the GPS to take me to 100 Indian Rd. north in Belleair FL. But it would only accept #600 which was quite a long way from 100
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not buy!!!! DISAPPOINTEDscam.... Beware
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk....I work in Erie PA for 11year . GPS can't find my work address..... GPS only 2 weeks old... Update new GPS isn't its old & can't update. Tom Tom has no comment. BEWARE..
customer_reviews.author: denns the menance

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like my TomTom Via 1525SE 5 Inch GPS Navigation Device with Free Lifetime Traffic. One annoying aspect is having to fiddle through several screens to drive to saved places. Everything else is just as I wanted. Yes, I would recommend and/or buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: rjsutherland

customer_reviews.title: TomTom GPS
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this GPS before a vacation in 2018. We found the database to be accurate and up-to-date and it will be available for the lifetime of the GPS, so there is no worry about having to subscribe and pay for updates. TomTom is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Albert L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fast response and show even in parking slot too.
customer_reviews.text: Very quality built and map always free update . the guild show easy to follow
customer_reviews.author: Tai

customer_reviews.title: Ok for money and purpose
customer_reviews.text: its ok. Not like the older Tom Tom but ok. Haven’t gone on trip to use it. We have 2 new Nissan's with gps however rather than pay XM Sirius that ridiculous price for traffic per year I bought this and traffic wise sure it’s better than XM Siriusxm.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Director Internal Affairs

customer_reviews.title: Dead batteries, low volume
customer_reviews.text: The device is old: real time clock defaults to 1/1/2000; bootloader has a date of 2011. The batteries were charged fully, for days, then when in use didn't ge me to my destination only 20 miles away. Then the device turns off then on, again, over and over. I have returned two of these, the last tiime for a refund. My overall rating is NO STARS for operation. The device works okay. The volume is not loud enough above the road noise.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ballou

customer_reviews.title: Worst TomTom I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Have been loyal to the brand but this thing is slow to respond to the touch and is absolutely terrible with traffic, which defeats the purpose. Both of my previous older models were better and it is unfortunate they eventually ran out of memory and were no longer supported. The screen's look while giving directions is good. Not much else positive to say. I will also leave a review directly with TomTom.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel M

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This item is ok. Information is not as accurate, seems slow, touch screen does not work very well. Update - after almost a year and a half the charging port broke, the cord too.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It takes some getting used to but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bottari

customer_reviews.title: FIANCE LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL LARGE SCREEN - EASY TO USE - EVERYTHING YOU NEED
customer_reviews.author: Larry O

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, makes life much easier on the road
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read, makes life much easier on the road
customer_reviews.author: John J Hill

customer_reviews.title: not better than old version
customer_reviews.text: It works not bad. Main disappointment is design of main drive window. Old version VIA1605 had main information concentrated on bottom and easy to read. Now information is spreaded in all sides. Piece of it on top close way ahead. This is no good in heavy and fast traffic. It looks like designer do not use GPS in his car. New model VIA 1625 is not better than VIA 1605 .May be worst.
customer_reviews.author: Gelo

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I tested this briefly and it seems very accurate. Will be driving from San Francisco with several stops along the way to Los Angeles and hope it will guide me correctly.
customer_reviews.author: BOCA RICH

customer_reviews.title: Mounts easily and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! Does everything it’s supposed to do. I use this unit with my onboard navigation. It’s easy to save locations and take with you to another vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: speedy delivery, The GPS looks fine
customer_reviews.text: I did have some problems with their web site. Called support and she was great at solving my problems. Haven't taken it on a trip yet (so I don't know how accurate ir is). I have had a Tom Tom GPS before and was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer.  TomTom stupid
customer_reviews.text: Bad gps. It does not rotate very well when you stick it on the windshield. It is very confusing. I hate it because there is no other ways but only freeways it doesn't take me for shortest cut. I hate freeways belways because there are only wreckless driver.
customer_reviews.author: Mario N. Viera

customer_reviews.title: Old technology bye bye
customer_reviews.text: If you need a GPS go for your phone carrier Not practical Our driver wanted it and we give it a try Is backwards Old technology We return it
customer_reviews.author: Just another guy shopping

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: I really hate this GPS. The one good thing about it is the sensitive touch screen. Other than that, it is slow, it won't display N and S for choices n a 12 mile long main highway where I live and consistently has led me to the wrong address, it was shutting down on me yesterday, and it is time consuming to navigate through it's many windows.
customer_reviews.author: C. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Good, but interface not as good as VIA1605
customer_reviews.text: My old VIA1605 has touchscreen issues and I bought the VIA1625 to replace it. I have not liked other GPS companies interfaces as much as TomTom's. I had hoped the 1625 would be an improved 1605, but I was wrong. The VIA1625 does not have as useful a menu system as the VIA1605, nor does it have as many options. The 1625 is adequate and I will keep it, but I am still looking for a good, simple GPS with a user-friendly TomTom style interface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful! Dies quickly though.
customer_reviews.text: Was very useful and very accurate. However, to get to the screens to type an address, etc is pretty slow. Still works just as great when needed for navigation. Dies pretty quick have to keep it plugged in the car to prevent turning off after an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: TomTom Navigator
customer_reviews.text: Like this Tom Tom much better than the Garmin. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not show time or MPH on display
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this one this is the 3rd TomTom I have had and not satisfied at all with this one. Does not show half what my old one did! Will not buy another!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Eccellent GPS and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My only suggestion to improve the device is to increase the volume of the audio directions and street names. Even at the maximum volume setting it is difficult to hear the spoken words especially when driving at highway speeds. It would be great if Tom Tom would provide a software update to increase the maximum volume.
customer_reviews.author: bQ

customer_reviews.title: Big Tom Tom
customer_reviews.text: Our last Tom Tom was a small one and got the dinosaur age! Still learning. It has more features then the older one. We like it and recommend this Tom Tom.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Eagle Fran

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the battery,it's either low or dead. It don't seem to charge up. driving along and it goes blank
customer_reviews.author: George Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Total junk don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have had several tomtom's and I had no problems with any of them except this one. It's a piece of junk. It takes 20 to 30 seconds for it to register each touch of the screen. I don't have 15 minutes to put an address in. I liked it better too when you just typed the whole address in instead of the city then search the street then search the house number then search. Way to time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Not switching on after just 5 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint is that after just 5 months the thing has stopped working and apparently is not covered by a warranty. The unit was always annoying slow to turn on, but it always got me where I wanted to go. This is the second Tomtom I've bought over the years (no problems with the first one). But now I think I'll give another brand a try. I would expect to at least get a couple of years of use out of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought a new one for our trip to the West Coast and it has been amazing. Very clear voice with precise directions. So easy to follow and understand.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R GUSTKE

customer_reviews.title: Preferred my older one
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Tom Tom that did not have sufficient memory for the new updates, so I bought a new one. The interface on the old one was more intuitive. I am already having issues with the touch screed requiring multiple touches before it recognizes a request.
customer_reviews.author: L C M

customer_reviews.title: The new model Tom Tom covers all of US, Canada & Mexico.
customer_reviews.text: I am partial to the Tom Tom products over the years. I like how the screens are laid out and the method of inputting instructions. I travel extensively all over the US and much of Canada and previous models covered only the US. Over the years, the updates were causing me to remove setting because of memory inadequacy.
customer_reviews.author: Romualdas Barauskas

customer_reviews.title: VIA1525M
customer_reviews.text: The phone is in excellent condition,almost new. Everything works perfect on my ATT service. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis RC

customer_reviews.title: Tells you what lane to be in when approaching a turn off
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best gift my husband could have given me.I used it two days after receiving for a trip to Montana and it was awesome tells you everything and don't have to be looking at maps or wondering where you are..
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Sounds crazy but for what I pay this is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: older models where not as complicated as this GPS, trying to figure this thing out, this is about the 5th TomTom that I have bought. hasel
customer_reviews.author: hasel

customer_reviews.title: ... thing works ok but the 1515m it replaced was better and easier to set up
customer_reviews.text: This thing works ok but the 1515m it replaced was better and easier to set up. I'm not unhappy but I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: nightoul

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected! Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He doesn’t have a smart phone and wanted to GPS. It’s exactly what he needed and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Barb from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The voice command is way better my previous voice operated GPS. Traffic notification and rerouting needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Joven

customer_reviews.title: BIG DISAPPOINTMENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I "upgraded" from an old XXL 550. VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!. Poi's are not maintainable. Ease of use-forget it. Customer support-have been trying for 1 1/2 hours to get through. No seller feedback button to try TomTom first. No online chat available. If TT does not respond to this in 5 calendar days, this is going BACK. The clock is ticking...
customer_reviews.author: cslewis lover

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t too happy with this product a little confused about how To use it. I couldn’t download nothing on my computer so I had to return it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dennisse Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: How to get it started.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't figured out how to use it yet. The old Tom, Tom just had to be turned on and used. This one has to be hooked up and registered and what ever else before you can use it. I'm not good with the computer. It took me a while to figure out how to even turn it on. There is a phone number to call, perhaps that will help me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of using the app on my phone. Went back to the trusted folks at TomTom. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Val-El

customer_reviews.title: This Tomtom must go
customer_reviews.text: Too dim when plugged in to charger, not easy to use. Has a mind of its own. My old Tomtom was ten times better. Sending it back. If it don't do what it is intended for what good is it?
customer_reviews.author: Dante P.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST GPS
customer_reviews.text: TOMTOM IS ONE OF THE BEST GPS UNITS I HAVE USED
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TomTom does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice unit, I think the tomtom one xl I had was a little smoother but this one is worth the money and I would buy it again. Links up really fast and very accurate
customer_reviews.author: S. Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: TomTom Map Unit
customer_reviews.text: I find the screen to pale as compared to my6 year old TomTom 100 series unit. Speed limit match feature is good. Have not needed or used traffic feature as yet Still practicing. Pale screen disappointing. PBR
customer_reviews.author: PBR New Eng

customer_reviews.title: Gets me where I want to go!
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked a better voice selection to choose from. I prefer a man’s voice as I find that easier to hear.
customer_reviews.author: RuthieJune

customer_reviews.title: Most likely Fake!
customer_reviews.text: Came and was all in Russian with no way to change it! Oh ya it was fake!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Tlamka

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy is not high.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of addresses are incorrect or not available. Speed limits are frequently wrong. Had for 6 months and still no map updates available.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Warnke

customer_reviews.title: but still a great model.
customer_reviews.text: Display is not as bright as the older models, but still a great model.
customer_reviews.author: Leo23

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this device late 2018 with "Free" map and traffic updates stated on box
customer_reviews.text: The free traffic maps are not free. You must sign up for the "free" traffic feature and updates for a fee of course. It states is comes with Lifetime Traffic right on the outside of the box. I would not buy it again and I think Amazon needs to look into this false claim.........
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Stefancci

customer_reviews.title: this is great! it's so much faster than my last tomtom ...
customer_reviews.text: this is great! it's so much faster than my last tomtom and almost half the price. love the traffic updates and lane changes. just what i needed at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: mizztanya

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small picture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace one that was stolen recently, tho;t it was same one, quite a bit smaller, works very well tho so I use it daiy.
customer_reviews.author: Reino Linne

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I thought 10 stars+++
customer_reviews.text: This is not my old TomTom, which still works, we got another car and didn't want to keep moving them around. I love the 6" screen and you will too. Ken
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kenneth G Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: TomTom 1625
customer_reviews.text: I have so many problems with this TomTom it is garbage as far as I'm concerned. Just thrown in a box, no bubbles, no paper nothing to keep from bouncing around in shipping. . You cannot see the screen, it does not recall towns you have put in previous. I'd advise not to purchase this TomTom JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Less intuitive than my last TomTom
customer_reviews.text: My last TomTom had better features that were easier to access. Would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Grouseru

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this Tom Tom. So easy to use! And for the cost it is well worth it! And will be well used.. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: jshelko

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk Bought this product left it sit on the kitchen table for three weeks without opening the box then I opened it up tried to use it you can’t see the screen you can’t bring the brightness up very hard to say don’t ever buy this product
customer_reviews.author: VOUGHT

customer_reviews.title: No update allow to map after initial installation
customer_reviews.text: "The return went smoothly. However, I would have been nice to know that the map could not be updated following the initial installation. I would purchase a replacement if I could be assured that the map is not outdated right out of the box! How can one be assured that they are not purchasing an outdated item?"
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust completely!
customer_reviews.text: it works well, but the maps has gotten us lost more than couple times. I would suggest having a secondary direction option.
customer_reviews.author: ScarletMagpie

product_meta.title: TomTom Via 1625TM 6-Inch GPS Navigation Device with Free Lifetime Traffic
product_meta.description: Size:6-Inch| Style:Live Traffic & Lifetime Maps| Configuration:North America MapsThe TomTom via 1625Tm offers essential navigation, free lifetime traffic, and free lifetime map updates. Finding destinations is simple from the search menu or by touching a point on the map. Advanced lane guidance helps you prepare for exits and intersections by clearly highlighting the correct driving lane for your planned route. 6 inch touchscreen.
feature_bullets: Lifetime TomTom Traffic; Premium real time traffic information service; It pinpoints exactly where delays start and end so you always know your fastest route
Free lifetime map updates; Enjoy free map updates with the latest road changes for the life of your navigation device at no extra cost
Clear and easy navigation with advanced lane guidance; never miss a turn again; Get extra clarity when navigating complex junctions
Touchscreen display; 6 inch touchscreen display with split screen junction view Canada and Mexico
Tomtom maps of USA, Canada and Mexico
Spoken Instructions in more than 30 different languages

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,111 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: USB cable, RDS-TMC traffic, Reversible integrated mount, VIA 1625TM device, Quick start guide, Car charger
